name: Malefic Cosmic Blazar Dragon
text: cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 "Cosmic Blazar Dragon" from your Extra Deck. There can only be 1 face-up "Malefic" monster on the field. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can banish this face-up card until your next Standby Phase and target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy that target. Other monsters you control cannot declare an attack. If there is no face-up Field Spell card on the field, destroy this card.
